items.name: Chocolate Fudge
items.description: Rich and indulgent chocolate fudge cake, layered with velvety ganache for a melt-in-your-mouth experience.

items.name: Three Milk Cake
items.description: A moist and creamy tres leches cake soaked in a trio of milk, topped with whipped cream.

items.name: Coffee Cake
items.description: Fluffy coffee-flavored cake with a hint of cinnamon, perfect for coffee lovers and dessert enthusiasts alike.

items.name: Red Velvet Cake
items.description: A classic red velvet cake with a smooth cream cheese frosting, ideal for celebrations and sweet cravings.

items.name: Fudge Brownie
items.description: Dense and gooey fudge brownie with a rich chocolate flavor thatâ€™s a chocoholic's dream.

items.name: Caramel Brownie
items.description: Chocolate brownie swirled with golden caramel for a decadent, sweet, and salty treat.

items.name: Oreo Brownie
items.description: Chewy brownie layered with crushed Oreo cookies for a crunchy and chocolaty twist.

items.name: Espresso Brownie
items.description: Brownie infused with espresso for a bold coffee kick, perfect for coffee and dessert lovers.

items.name: Nutella Brownie
items.description: Decadent brownie swirled with creamy Nutella, offering a luscious hazelnut-chocolate experience.

items.name: Galaxy Sundae
items.description: A celestial treat with chocolate ice cream, brownie chunks, and a drizzle of chocolate sauce.

items.name: Nutella Sundae
items.description: Creamy Nutella ice cream topped with crushed hazelnuts and a generous Nutella drizzle.

items.name: Red Velvet Sundae
items.description: Red velvet cake pieces layered with vanilla ice cream and a dollop of cream cheese frosting.

items.name: Three Milk Sundae
items.description: A delicious twist on tres leches, with cake bites, creamy milk ice cream, and caramel drizzle.
